timeline.message: Remove disabled by default servlet instrumentation

timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText:
mostly editorial, as it's the first one listed in the typeMatcher below
also, it's slightly more specific, since Filter not introduced until servlet 2.3, though that doesn't really matter since we have classLoaderMatcher that already limits to 3.0+ in the InstrumentationModule
replies.author: trask
